channel.title: CVE Feed for HasThemes -- HT Mega
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HasThemes -- HT Mega

item.title: CVE-2024-38706|2024-07-12T14:08:50.645Z -- hasthemes -- ht%20mega
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in HasThemes HT Mega allows Path Traversal.This issue affects HT Mega: from n/a through 2.5.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-30182|2024-03-27T11:46:10.227Z -- hasthemes -- ht%20mega
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes HT Mega allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HT Mega: from n/a through 2.4.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-32782|2024-06-04T17:52:13.150Z -- hasthemes -- ht%20mega
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in HasThemes HT Mega.This issue affects HT Mega: from n/a through 2.4.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-37999|2024-05-17T06:51:44.725Z -- hasthemes -- ht%20mega
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in HasThemes HT Mega allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects HT Mega: from n/a through 2.2.0.
